data.headline: Aspiring Product Manager with a Passion for Startups
data.summary: Driven and adaptable Product Manager with a strong technical background and a keen interest in the startup ecosystem.

experience.title: Product Management Intern
bullets: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and launch a new mobile app for the company's flagship product
Conducted user research and analyzed customer feedback to identify pain points and inform product roadmap
Assisted in creating product specifications, user stories, and wireframes to guide the development process

experience.title: Product Management Consultant
bullets: Provided product strategy and management support to early-stage startups in the tech and e-commerce sectors
Facilitated customer discovery workshops and translated user insights into actionable product requirements
Assisted in the development of MVP prototypes and conducted user testing to validate product-market fit

experience.title: Junior Product Manager
bullets: Collaborated with engineering, design, and marketing teams to define and prioritize product features
Developed and maintained product roadmaps, KPIs, and release plans to ensure timely delivery of product updates
Conducted user research, A/B testing, and data analysis to optimize the user experience and drive product growth

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: Designed and developed a personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and professional experience.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Emilie Dupont, a young woman with brown hair and a friendly smile, wearing a white blouse and standing in front of a plain background.
